name: Vimalator
description:
Repetition, repetition and repetition, the ever existing lives of the moderators.  Dark looming hallways, filled with engless thoughs. back and forth in ever lasting conversations. is this what my life will be? what is life... my life?

         WASD to move around.

Mouse to look around & Left mouse click to interact.

The assets within the game except the below assets are created by:

MarkusCPersson

Assets used:

Music by:  

Ray Chen (Violin Soloist) playing;

"The Sawn" Saint Saens

Bach Saranande
